rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the seat height.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster for chair direction adjustment.

clean_caster.description: Clean the caster to ensure smooth movement.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel for chair movement.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to remove dust or any other particles.

press_seat.description: Press the seat to check its comfort level.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat to ensure cleanliness.

clean_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to remove dust or any other particles.

assemble_chair.description: No action needed for chair assembly as the chair leg is not detachable.

clean_full_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the knob, caster, wheel, seat and chair leg.

check_chair_function.description: Check the functionality of the chair by rotating the knob, caster, wheel and pressing the seat.
